gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مجهول - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (2/214)

parts.text: عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى
أُمَامَةَ بِنْتِ أَبِي الْعَاصِ بْنِ الرَّبِيعِ
أُمُّهَا زَيْنَبُ بِنْتُ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله )

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحَكَمِ عَنْ أَبَانِ بْنِ عُثْمَانَ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ عَنْ فَاطِمَةَ بِنْتِ عَلِيٍّ عَنْ أُمَامَةَ بِنْتِ أَبِي الْعَاصِ بْنِ الرَّبِيعِ وَ أُمُّهَا زَيْنَبُ بِنْتُ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) قَالَ

text: تْ أَتَانِي أَمِيرُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ عَلِيٌّ ( عليه السلام ) فِي شَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ فَأُتِيَ بِعَشَاءٍ وَ تَمْرٍ وَ كَمْأَةٍ فَأَكَلَ ( عليه السلام ) وَ كَانَ يُحِبُّ الْكَمْأَةَ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Abdullah Bin Muhammad Bin Isa, from Ali Bin Al Hakam, from Aban Bin Usman, from Abu Baseer,

(It has been narrated) from Fatima<sup>as</sup> daughter of Ali<sup>asws</sup>, from Amamat daughter of Abu Al A’as, from Al Rabie and her mother Zaynab daughter of Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup>, said, ‘Amir Al Momineen<sup>asws</sup> came over to me in a Month of Ramazan, so he<sup>asws</sup> came for dinner, and dates, and truffles. So he<sup>asws</sup> ate, and he was loving the truffles’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from ‘Abd Allah ibn Muhammad ibn ‘Isa from Ali ibn al-Hakam, from Aban ibn ‘Uthman from abu Basir from Fatimah daughter Ali from ’Umamah daughter of abu al-‘Ass ibn al-Rabi‘ and her mother, Zaynab daughter the Messenger of Allah who has said the following: “Once ’Amir al-Mu’minin, Ali, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, in the month of Ramadan came to me. For dinner, he brought dates and truffles. He (the Imam) ate it and he liked truffles.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (22/214)

narrator_chain.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْفُضَيْلِ عَنْ عَبْدِ الرَّحْمَنِ بْنِ زَيْدٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) الْكَمْأَةُ مِنَ الْمَنِّ وَ الْمَنُّ مِنَ الْجَنَّةِ وَ مَاؤُهَا شِفَاءٌ لِلْعَيْنِ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Abu Abdullah, from Muhammad Bin Ali, from Muhammad Bin Al Fuzayl, from Abdul Rahman Bin Zayd,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> said: ‘The truffle is from the Manna, and the Manna is from the Paradise, and its water is a healing for the eyes’.
en.sarwar: 2. A number of our people have narrated from Ahmad ibn abu ‘Abd Allah from Muhammad ibn Ali from Muhammad ibn al-Fudayl from ‘Abd al-Rahman ibn Zayd who has said the following: “Abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said that the Messenger of Allah, O Allah, grant compensation to Muhammad and his family worthy of their services to Your cause, has said, ‘The truffle is from Manna (honeydew, a kind of tree sap) which is from paradise and its water is cure for the eye.’”
